list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long narrow band or strip, typically of the same width throughout its length, differing in color or texture from the surface on either side of it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a pair of blue shorts with pink stripes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một cặp quần short màu xanh với sọc hồng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a chevron sewn on to a uniform to denote military rank.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was wearing his old uniform without its sergeant's stripes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta đang mặc đồng phục cũ của mình mà không có sọc của trung sĩ

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her body was striped with bands of sunlight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cơ thể cô bị sọc với các dải ánh sáng mặt trời
